Name: Earth Particle Lv.3
Description: Alchemy material used to craft Earth Serum and Earth Drop.
Description2$english: A crystal particle of the earth element, with the power of the earth flowing slowly within the crystal. Though as fine as a particle, it still contains immense strength and resilience.

recipes.Name: Earth Particle Lv.3
recipes.Des: Alchemy material used to craft Earth Serum and Earth Drop. Obtained from Artisanryâ€‹.

NeedMaterial.Name: Earth Crystal Shard Lv.3
NeedMaterial.Description: Can be obtained during Monster Hunts, and after precise processing, it can be used for Alchemy. It is a basic material.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A crystal rich in Engram. Easy to collect and process. Due to absorbing Engram from the atmosphere and underground during crystallization, its specific composition and shape vary by region.
